name: onaww
description: One Night a Werewolf browser-based multiplayer game

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.security:audit: npm run security:audit:backend && npm run security:audit:frontend
scripts.security:snyk: npm run security:snyk:backend && npm run security:snyk:frontend
scripts.security:all: npm run security:audit && npm run security:snyk
scripts.security:fix: cd backend && npm audit fix && cd ../frontend && npm audit fix
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
